robot

Class RVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • robot.RVM

  • public class RVM
extends java.lang.Object
    Main package class with the constructor of the robot and its data.
    Author:
    Renato Cordeiro Ferreira

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RVM(java.util.Vector<Command> PROG)
      Class constructor specifying a 'program' (vector of objects of the class Command) to the RVM.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void exec()
      Execute 1 assembly instruction.
      void run()
      Function responsible for executing the 'program', step by step, untill a syscall operation.
      static void sleep(RVM rvm)
      Set the robot's state to SLEEP.
      void upload(java.util.Vector<Command> PROG)
      Setter method created to upload a new 'program' (vector of object of the class Command) in the RVM.
      static void wake(RVM rvm)
      Set the robot's state to ACTIVE.
